text:
Square | Frontend, Backend, etc. | Atlanta | Onsite | Full time

Square's Atlanta office hosts our Commerce Platform and Payment Acceptance teams. We build core components shared across many of our products on mobile, web and backend. We are currently hiring talented engineers at all skill levels who would like to help make commerce easy for businesses across the US and around the world.

If you want to work with world class engineers building highly available products at scale, we have jobs available working on Android, iOS, Web, and backend (mostly Java and Go) projects.

Details: https://squareup.com/careers/jobs?location=Atlanta%2C+United...
